snippet: David Clarkson and Patrik Elias scored in a shootout to lift the  Devils over the Sabres. Chris Kunitz scored his second goal 18 seconds into the third period to help the Penguins beat the Flyers.
abstract: New Jersey Devils rally to beat Buffalo Sabres, 3-2, in NHL action; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: David Clarkson and Patrik Elias scored in a shootout to lift the  Devils over the Sabres. Chris Kunitz scored his second goal 18 seconds into the third period to help the Penguins beat the Flyers.

headline.seo: Devils Beat Sabres and Penguins Defeat Flyers
headline.main: Devils Rally, Then Win in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Devils Rally, Then Win in Shootout
